mapper.select: SELECT b.RESORT_ID , b.RESORT_NM , a.ROOM_NO , a.ROOM_NM , a.ROOM_TYPE , a.ROOM_TYPE_NM , a.OCCUPANCY , a.PRICE , a.PEAK_PRICE FROM ROOM a JOIN RESORT b ON ( b.RESORT_ID = a.RESORT_ID ) WHERE a.RESORT_ID = #{resortId} AND a.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

SELECT b.RESORT_ID , b.RESORT_NM , a.BOOKING_DT , a.ROOM_NO , a.ROOM_NM , c.ROOM_TYPE , c.ROOM_TYPE_NM , c.OCCUPANCY , c.SPACE , c.PRICE , c.PEAK_PRICE FROM BOOKING a JOIN RESORT b ON ( b.RESORT_ID = a.RESORT_ID ) JOIN CALENDAR cal ON ( cal.DT = a.BOOKING_DT) LEFT JOIN ROOM c ON ( c.RESORT_ID = a.RESORT_ID AND c.ROOM_NO = a.ROOM_NO ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND cal.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y'
AND a.BOOKING_DT = #{bookingDt}
ORDER BY a.RESORT_ID, a.BOOKING_DT, a.ROOM_NO
